content: Is there a way to access the graphs page in a way that brings up only one of the benchmarks, or only a specified subset of the benchmarks? It would be nice sometimes to link directly to the graph of interest.
anchors on the charts would also help
@pnkfelix we should make an issue for this. Can you talk about what you'd like to use this for?
Well the most immediate use case is when thereâ€™s something concerning that I want to share with others
Its a real drag to have to describe in text what to scroll down to
(it would also be nice to be able to encode in the URL what portion of the graph to zoom into, but that might be a more significant request.)
The start/end of the graphed range is already possible to put in the url, but we don't currently support synthesizing it from the "zoom" on the graph itself.
At the very least it should be easy to add anchor points so you can link to url#encoding or something like that and the browser in theory will scroll for us
